name: Mythifood Adventure
description:
Greetings Traveller! Are you hungry? 

~ Because we got a tasty game in the cooker for you!

Chef Pierre and his assistant Alain are cooks in a very sought-after tavern deep within a mythical forest.

Together they are tasked with the difficult mission to provide their customers with the wildest and freshest meal they can procure.

To produce the meals the dynamic duo must venture out into the dangerous wilderness to chase, battle and search for the magical foodstuffs that have sprung to life.

The fact that they are now alive, does not make them any less delicious. The two brave cooks are the only ones with the skill and knowledge to collect the ingredients to make the finest dishes on the continent.


If you want to check out the gameplay here it is!
